description:
Did You Know That Those Who Work Hard & Assert Themselves, Can Use Their Imaginations to Shape the World and Accomplish Just About Anything?

We all get frustrated when we feel taken advantage of, or, respond too aggressively when we feel provoked or trapped. You'll be glad to hear that it's possible to overcome these knee-jerk responses by learning to become assertive.

'Man Up: A Complete Guide to Genuine Assertiveness'  reveals what assertiveness is, and how it's different from aggressive or passive behaviours. You'll discover a range of actionable ideas for responding to difficult situations and challenging people types with ease.

Bu understanding how to control emotions, you'll learn how to have more controlled conversations, demonstrate confidence and use these skills to build healthier and more rewarding relationships.

By the end of this course you will be able to:

  • Recognise Aggressive, Passive and Assertive Behaviours.
  • Make Requests of Other People With More Confidence & Ease.
  • Deal With Confrontation & Challenges in an Assertive Manner.
  • Say 'No' to Unreasonable Requests & Assertively Agree on Solutions.
  • Have Controlled Conversations to Build More Effective Relationships.
  • Access Tips & Techniques For Building Genuine Confidence & Self Esteem.
  • Identify Your Natural Strengths & Areas Where You Need to Develop Assertiveness.
  • Have the Confidence to Challenge, Say No & Ask For What You Want Without Damaging the Relationships You Have With Others.


'Man Up: A Complete Guide to Genuine Assertiveness' will introduce you to a range of actionable ideas for building up your confidence, and developing your self-esteem.

You'll become confident in making requests, saying NO to the unreasonable demands of others, and begin addressing common workplace problems with greater boldness and ease.

Upon completing the course, you'll realise that how you act, think and behave in all situations will always be determined by the choices you make. You have the capacity to develop authentic assertiveness in every single area of your life!

This course comes with a Full Money Back Guarantee! So enrol today, and if you're anything less that fully satisfied, you can get a full refund within 30 days of purchase.
title: Man Up: A Complete Guide To Genuine Assertiveness
